```{r}
username <- Sys.info()['user']
pathReadCSV <-
  file.path(paste0('C:/Users/', username, '/Desktop/timeSeriesCSVdata/'))
setwd(pathReadCSV)
if (length(dir(pathReadCSV)) != 0) {
  for (fff in 1:length(dir(pathReadCSV))) {
    tmp <-
      read.csv(
        file = dir(pathReadCSV)[fff],
        header = T,
        as.is = T,
        skip = 0,
        na.strings = c("", "NA"),
        stringsAsFactors = F,
        check.names = F
      )
    if (fff == 1) {
      dataSet <- tmp
    } else{
      dataSet <- merge(dataSet, tmp, all = T)
    }
  }
}
dataSet0 <- na.omit(dataSet)
```

```{r}
pathOutput <-
  paste0('C:/Users/', username, '/Desktop/R_Data_Write/')
setwd(pathOutput)
write.csv(
  dataSet,
  "dataSet.csv",
  row.names = F,
  append = F,
  quote = F,
  fileEncoding = "cp932" # cp932 UTF-8
) #col.names=Tを付けると日本語が文字化けする
write.table(
  dataSet,
  "dataSet.txt",
  row.names = F,
  append = F,
  quote = F,
  fileEncoding = "cp932",
  sep = '\t'
)
write.csv(
  dataSet0,
  "dataSet0.csv",
  row.names = F,
  append = F,
  quote = F,
  fileEncoding = "cp932"
)
write.table(
  dataSet0,
  "dataSet0.txt",
  row.names = F,
  append = F,
  quote = F,
  fileEncoding = "cp932",
  sep = '\t'
)
```
